Tender Title: GB-Telford: Insurance and Claims Management System
Tender Description: Provision of software for an Insurance and Claims Management System to the team who provide advice on insurance and liability matters to all areas of the Council and Schools

The provider will provide Blue Badge Mobility Assessments as per blue badge criteria to people referred to the service via staff at the Council, approximately up to 1,200 mobility assessments in each year (up to 25 per week) with the ability to provide additional support should the referral rate require it.
